model.data

Class Troncon

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.data.Troncon

  • public class Troncon
extends java.lang.Object
    Troncon is the link between two points, a street It has a name, a velocity, a length and an orientation
    Author:
    Vadim Caen, Maria Etegan, Anthony Faraut, Ludmila Danilescu, Marco Montalto, Bernardo Rittmeyer

        Classe constructor specifying its attributes
        Parameters:
        nomRue - is the name of the street.
        vitesse - is the velocity
        longueur - is the distance between the points
        pointDepart - is the start point of the street
